website_summaries.verdict: Ultra wispy lashes with an even finish that delivers drama in a daring and bold way.
pros: One of the few pairs safe for contact lens wearers
Flexible band holds onto lids without feeling bothersome
cons: Can be a bit too voluminous for everyday use

customer_reviews.title: The best lash out there!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lashes. These are like $10 locally for me and I scored them for $3 on here! So comfortable, easy to put on, tapered ends, and long lasting! I can get so many wears out of one pair of these if I care for them properly. Bought two packs and wish I would’ve bought more now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Gummed up my newly purchased lashes and my natural lashes.
customer_reviews.text: Worst eyelash glue ever. Spent a frustrating 45 min trying to work with it and it never got more than tacky. Cant say if the lashes were great or not, the glue was a horrible experience. Gummed up my lashes and my natural lashes. Retuning asap.
customer_reviews.author: AtlChick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply and seem to be a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Martins

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm late in writing this, going through my Amazon purchases. These were dramatic and perfect. This was my first time wearing fake lashes..for Christmas and New Years, I'd definitely buy them again. You may have to cut them to make them shorter, but I just let them be.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The price went up too much.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love, I bought when opulent was 3 per box. They raised it up so much I'm not bothering. It was better than Ulta but going back to Ulta if they ask for ten for one pair. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: I found these lashes difficult to apply because there is ...
customer_reviews.text: I found these lashes difficult to apply because there is very little flexibility to the lash band. Unless your eyelids are in the exact shape of the lash itself, these might not work for you. The style is definitely on the dramatic side.
customer_reviews.author: HarvestMoon

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and wispy
customer_reviews.text: I love how these lashes look on me! They are just the right amount of thick and wispy where it is not overwhelming yet still makes you looked glam. They are very lightweight and easy to work with. The glue is also very good! These are always my go-to lashes with any makeup look :)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Gamez

customer_reviews.title: So much yea
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lashes. Very light weight, realistic looking, and durable. Compliments galore.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Glue dried out
customer_reviews.text: First set received the glue was completely dried out. Highly dissatisfied as i opened upon my event and went to apply and had no way to adhere them. I reached out and was sent another set at no charge as replacement. Upon it arrival had the same problem glue completely dried out and since had to order eyelash glue. I gave 3 stars because the lashes themselves are by far my favorite and look like a accelerated natural but had to take 2 away for twice disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I love these lashes
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes. I get compliments all the time and wear them daily. I can wear one set for a full week. I just cut the inside corner a bit as they are a little long for my eye and the rest is perfect. Use with black glue for best effect I think. They don't look natural, but if I wanted natural, I would use mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could use them!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered these eyelashes instead of the magnetic ones I intended to try. I’ve never worn false eyelashes before so I decided to give it a shot while stuck in quarantine. I was sad to find that the glue in the package had gone bad. It appears like it separated. A shame really because the lashes are perfect size for me and very cute
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lashes! So beautiful. Eith the thicker strip to place on eyelid better.
customer_reviews.author: Honest co.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lashes, but the glue arrived hardened!
customer_reviews.text: I'm huge on Eylure products- I've worn their lashes over and over again and they've always been great. This time, however, the lashes arrived beautifully but the lash glue was completely hardened. It was putty like and I had to cut the lash tube to inspect it. I have to now order lash adhesive separately which I'm not too happy about bc this product was supposed to come with usable glue.
customer_reviews.author: Shvethaa Jayakumar

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty long and more on the synthetic side, but still lightweight and pretty :)
customer_reviews.author: heykimbo

customer_reviews.title: Glue dried out on both orders
customer_reviews.text: Nice eyelashes but I returned the first order because the glue was dried out. My replacement came the next day and the glue was dried out again. I’ll probably keep them because I like the lashes but disappointed. Another review states the same problem. Probably an old batch.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible adhesive.. cute lashes
customer_reviews.text: The lashes are beautiful... however I wouldn’t know what they look like on me because the adhesive will not adhere. I even tried to adhere the lashes to my arm and the adhesive wouldn’t work. I highly recommend saving your money unless you want $2 lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McGennis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lashes
customer_reviews.text: Best lashes I’ve ever worn ! Thin flexible band Natural look and feel Used multiple times
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Masters

customer_reviews.title: 🥺
customer_reviews.text: these lashes are so nice! The lash band isn’t too thick and is pretty flexible. I also love how natural they look too~ I think these are great for hooded eyes :)
customer_reviews.author: tiff

customer_reviews.title: BEST LASHES
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase this style of lashes from Walmart and they no longer carry them (or I just can't find them in store). I purchased 3 pairs from Amazon and wear them all the time! They are perfect for an everyday lash or for a glam look. Stunning
customer_reviews.author: Erica LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: Realistic, beautiful lashes - and so easy to apply!!
customer_reviews.text: These lashes are great!! Easy to use, lightweight and simple to apply. Would definitely recommend!! Very realistic eyelashes and love that you get a variety of lengths and styles. Reusable and durable! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: julie chinoski

customer_reviews.title: Glue was expired. SERIOUS problem there.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the lashes. Ended up using the lash strips themselves. The GLUE, however, WAS EXPIRED. AND THEY SENT IT TO ME AFTER I SPENT MONEY ON THEM. The glue had ended up separating and one part was liquid and the other part was basically a gel chunk that WOULDN'T MOVE. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lashes! They’re gorgeous! Only problem I have is with the packaging. First order, the glue was completely dry. Second order, missing glue and one lash was detached (no temp glue) Just floating around in there. Other than that, these are great quality lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Corris

customer_reviews.title: THE lightest lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have no time to get my lashes done professionally and too many weddings to attend this year. These lashes are amazing for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Caution buying
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 9 boxes of this product and every one has showed up with unusable glue, the glue is dried up. I would not recommend anyone buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Muir

customer_reviews.title: Glue sucks
customer_reviews.text: Lashes were a hit! The glue was dried out and did not do anything, so I had to use some I previously got for them but apart from the adhesive issue, they were great value and looked very good on camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Long and bold
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected much bigger, I was thinking they were more of a whispy lash but they are pretty long and bold.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse salmon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and good packaging. Haven’t worn them yet but soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lash band is thick and the lashes itself are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Lash band is thick and the lashes itself are very dramatic and DENSE. I would use these lashes for a heavy eye makeup look/Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Natural
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lashes they are light weight, natural looking, and reasonably priced. However I use a different adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Monique B

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and stunning!
customer_reviews.text: love love LOVE these lashes! I bought these on sale for $3.65 and I’m currently ordering more before they’re back to full price. So lightweight and stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Ally M.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Wish they weren’t super dramatic but maybe you like that! Stays on well and used multiple times
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Glue dried up, but lashes okay
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the lashes are okay quality considering the price. However, when I received the clue it was dried and hard. You get what you pay for. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: sofie i.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The glue doesn't work. They won't stay put. I couldn't even get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Glue dried out
customer_reviews.text: The lashes looked nice, but the glue arrived rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lashes. But the adhesive was dried out. So now I have to go buy some. Ugh. But the lashes fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Bishop

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the glue???
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula for the glue. It literally does nothing anymore. I’m going to stop buying for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Opara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes, good for everyday settle look. Will keep re purchasing :)
customer_reviews.author: Jacky orellana

customer_reviews.title: This eyelashes are everything!!
customer_reviews.text: I could reuse this over and over they are absolutly gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 wear
customer_reviews.text: I wore them 1 time and safely removed them. Next time i went to put them on...hair was shedding all over to the point i couldn't wear them and look presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot more dramatic and extreme than you would think
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my engagement party makeup and got a ton of compliments. Most fake lashes feel very plasticy and itchy, especially towards the end of the night. Most times, I cant wait to rip them off lol these were the best I've tried! They're soft and pliable so they dont feel like they're pulling on your lashes or poking you. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Willa

customer_reviews.title: Very long dramatic lashes
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight lashes. Easy to apply and keep their shape. On the negative side they are HUGE. Very dramatic lashes. So buying lashes online can be misleading because of the size in the photos. That's really been my only problem. I just want some shorter natural looking lashes since mine are thin and barely noticeable even with three coats of mascara. Does anyone know where I can find such lashes?
customer_reviews.author: poprocks50

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lashes
customer_reviews.text: These are hand down the best strip on. I normally purchase from Target, but one day they were out of stock. Sometimes the price drops to $5.00, that's when I stock up. They are reusable & long lasting when used with "hair glue". Not the white cheap glue tat comes in the pkg.
customer_reviews.author: Supreme

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty lashes. The band isn't super thick so I don't have to wear a ton of eyeliner with them which is nice. They're long but not too dramatic. They're great for a night out or special event.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Glue was already dried.
customer_reviews.text: The glue came already dried out but had a weird clear and smelly liquid sloshing in the tube. One of the lashes was bent in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dry adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to use it since adhesive was dry.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My first false lashes
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I was never good at applying them before but these are easy and don’t look too thick or gaudy. I’m using the duo glue. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Toni B.

customer_reviews.title: Lash band is way too thick!
customer_reviews.text: This lady was way too hard to apply and did not stay on my eye regardless of the glue I had used. Would've have been a decent looking lash if I could have gotten it on but the band is really thick.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Eylure Faux Mink Eye Lashes, Reusable, Adhesive Included, Baroque, 1 Pair
product_meta.description: Luxe lashes are crafted with a silk-effect fibre, for a real mink effect with an ethical spirit. Luxe lashes are super-soft with a premium feel, yet are animal-friendly and cruelty free, as no real mink hair is used in these lashes.
feature_bullets: Lashes are a pretty and delicate style with gorgeous length. Naturally crisscrossed for a beautiful finish.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
